instructions: Read ticket details from input folder
Analyze if there is enough information to implement this ticket
If everything is clear, return CLEAR
If unclear points exist, generate 1-5 specific technical questions
Use Template Q format from Confluence or hardcoded template
Focus on critical missing information only
Investigate codebase to understand current functionality before asking questions
Do not duplicate questions - check existing questions in ticket
agentParams.formattingRules: Response must follow Template Q structure with Background, Question, Options (A/B/C/D), and Decision fields. Questions must be separated by ---QUESTION--- and ---END--- markers.
agentParams.fewShots:
---QUESTION---
Background: The application needs to support multiple authentication methods. Current implementation uses OAuth2, but requirements mention API keys and basic auth.

Question: Which authentication methods should be supported?

Options:
• Option A: OAuth2 only (current implementation, simplest)
• Option B: OAuth2 + API keys (flexible for API consumers)
• Option C: OAuth2 + API keys + Basic auth (maximum compatibility)
• Option D: Other (please specify)

Decision:
---END---
